thread.title: Location is magnifico inside is decent!
thread.title_full: Location is magnifico inside is decent! - Review of Element New York Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Zorro123
title: Location is magnifico inside is decent!
text: We went there during the holidays and every hotel was skyrocket expensive. But this one remained to be at the affordable range out of the nearest hotels in time square that is very decent inside. You go any cheaper it will look more like a 200 year old motel inside. You go with more decency it will be more like quadruple the price. In other words this is more like "value for money". Not the cheapest in the world, not the most decent either. But good enough to be placed in a fantastic location. Walking distance to regal cinemas broadway shows timesquare street shows restaurants taxis you name it. For a tourist who wants to immerse with newyorks craziness for a fee nights. This is the place to be!
